title: Stuck forever
body:
http://image.prntscr.com/image/af4b9bf0d4034fa482bc1a48352532db.png

You can never leave when you link your facebook to League, and hell this is me trying to unlink my smurf (that i don't even remember attaching)

replies.body:
Hey dude, asked around and it's a current known issue but it can be resolved by removing the app from the facebook side of the link:

https://www.facebook.com/help/170585223002660

Let me know if you have any issues after trying those steps.

The problem isn't league having access, the problem is i don't want it on my smurf.

EDIT: and it's not even in the apps list, unless it's under a secret code name or something.

Odd, we confirmed that this works on an account that had the same issue. It looks like this in the app list:

http://imgur.com/Y2ychPb

I can understand why you wouldn't want it on your smurf in particular. My only guess as to why it is connected to both accounts if you didn't actively do so is that there's something similar about the accounts that this app looks at to link. This is all I can offer as far as boards help, if it's really this unique an issue I'd recommend [raising a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

http://image.prntscr.com/image/1cdfff08676546149892cab1cb1d3fb9.png

It's not there, not by any shape or mean.

And i don't want it on my smurf for the simple fact that i just don't want it to pop up on my smurf (i'd rather add people on my main)
